Text: If (e.g. on linux, using totem) you experience audio lag viewing the titles, try the VLC media player. That one works flawlessly.
Apparently, there's a French Chef Vol. 2 that's been available since Feb. 2006. Someone should snag that and upload it.
I want more series.... it is the best show for beginners!
Thanks, im making Boeuf Bourguignon this weekend, I hope this helps!

Holy crap!
I never thought I would ever find anything like this on TPB. I am glad that I am not the only one around here who appreciates the elegance and beauty of Julia Childs thoughts, opinions, and techniques for fine cooking!
A little bit of trivia:
Julia Child was a researcher for the Office of Strategic Services (OSS), the agency that became the CIA.
... And I will seed this little gem for a while too!
